column7: Advanced application of food production and management principles to specific food service demands; emphasis on artistry in preparation, serving, and merchandising high quality food in quantity. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: FSHN 340 and credit or concurrent registration in FSHN 442.
column9: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: FSHN 340 and credit or concurrent registration in FSHN 442.
